page.title: 16KINGMOOR LOCAL NEWS 1
page.content: {KINGMOOR LOCAL NEWS 1 {Sands Centre}Carlisle councillors have held an inquest in to the Sands Centre promotion flop during Great Fair Week.And after the behind closed doors meeting the Sands sub-committee chairman, Roger Horne, admitted they were disappointed but he added it was not the disaster it was made out to be. The Sands lost several thousand pounds when it had disappointing audiences for Little and Large, Lenny Henry and Ron Goodwin. {Gypsies }A new emergency gypsy site planned for Hadrian's Camp will make Houghton residents scared to leave their homes a top Tory councillor claims. Carlisle City Council has agreed to press for the site at the ex_army camp but the decision was bitterly opposed by Tory group leader Brian Porter,whose Stanwix Rural
